title: Do You See What You Get from Your Investment?
text:
Do You See What You Get from Your Investment? Do You See What You Get from Your Investment? Our lives are running in cycles whether it be day by day, month by month and so on, leaving little time for investment decision making. Print This Post 
It is historically proven that individuals spent more time planning their vacation than they do in planning their investments. 
Thus, it is completely normal that get caught up or distracted in our daily obligations and activities such that on most of our days our habits are running in cycles whether it be day by day, month by month and so on, leaving little time for investment decision making. 
However, in order to change our direction we need to reflect and think about our current position, i.e. where do we stand and where we are going or where we want to be in some period. 
They way you do anything is the way you do everything . -Whitney Cummings 
Some common behaviors and practices by top performing individuals in any discipline, field or area of success often include meditation, journaling, self-reflection, and solitude. If we just run through life or by extension investing opportunities then we sometimes may miss obvious things around us. 
On a personal note, interesting enough my best trading ideas came when I was under the sea, or meditating, or just not thinking about trading at all. Actually far away from computer screens and trading platforms. There are three levels of self-consciousness in trading or investing: The way your investment or strategy is running How you can influence your strategy or investment and how that can change the outcome of the strategy How you are looking at yourself when you are investing or trading 
Taken as a whole, all these three things can instigate profound repercussions on your trading performance, notwithstanding yielding a large impact on the financial results of your investment. 
To clarify, there are ultimately have three key points that you need to know: Programming your self for success: It is important to make sure you have right strategy and as a trader you are making constant and planned results, whereby limiting your risk to based on your personal fit. What is my money doing for me? Be aware that a good strategy can make you much higher levels of profit with same amount money than traditional investment funds, i.e. banking products and bonds. However, you can end up profiting with $100,000 just as your neighbor can with $600,000 invested with even less risk in some cases. If you take time to reflect and change your perception you can make your money work for you harder then you work for your money. Got a news tip? Let Us Know FOUND A MISTAKE
